name: MXCPUMetric
desc: An object representing metrics about the use of the CPU.

items.name: var cumulativeCPUTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total amount of CPU the app used.

items.name: var cumulativeCPUInstructions: Measurement<Unit>
items.desc: The total number of CPU instructions the app executed during the reporting period.
